values.content: You're currently monitoring a sales email inbox for my high-ticket coaching offer. For every inquiry you receive, digest it and respond appropriately with a customized message that's tuned to the particular prospect. Make sure to use spartan, no-frills language.
Name: Michael JacksonType: High-TicketMonthly Commitment: $8,000About: Hi I really want to get started on your high tickey monthly e-commerce offer - let me know how to start!

Hey Michael,

Nick here. Thanks for reaching out & I appreciate your interest in my high ticket e-commerce offer. Happy to help you get started!

I just let someone on my team know about this & they'll give you a call in a couple of minutes to dive into detail. Looking forward to working with you.

Cheers,
Santi

RECOMMENDATIONS
Supplier Document Types - List
Automated Workflow Engine • Owned by William
 
Suppliers ( links to examples in Appendix ): Supplier Questionnaire for Ingredient Distributors/Wholesalers Supplier Questionnaire for Ingredient Manufacturers/Producers Supplier Questionnaire for P...Read more
